pancha maha wadayan atharin udamwita wadaya pawathi rambaukkana udamwita tampita wihara mandiraye sanwardhana katayuthu nimawemin pawathi.rupiyal laksha 14 kata aasanna mudalak waya karamin garawatunu tampita wiharaya sanwardhanaya kirimata sabaragamu palath pradhana amathi mahipala herath mahatha jathika urumayan pilibanda amathi aacharya jagath balasuriya mahathage da wishesha awadhanaya yomuwima nisa udamwita tampita wihara mandiraye wada awasan kirimata haki wu bawa wiharadhipathi sawandara gunarathana himiyo pawasuha.mahanuwara yugayata ayath me tampita wiharaya ithihasagatha wanne migettuwaththe gunananda himiyan saha hunupola nilame namathi kristhiyani gam pradhaniyaku athara siduwu suprasiddha wiwadaya nisaweni.tampita wihara mandiraya garawati kisiwekuge awadhanayata hasu nowi mita wasara kipayak thisse sanwardhana yojanawalata pamanak sima wi thibuna athara, “dinamina” puwathpatha mangin awastha kipayakadima penwa dimath samanga jathika urumayan pilibanda amathyanshaya awashya prathipadana wenkaralimata piyawara ganini.sabaragamuwa palath purawidya sahakara adhyaksha thissa madurapperuma mahathage upades paridi purawidya departhamenthuwe jyeshta karmika niladhari es. em. ee. ke. samarapperuma mahathage adhikshanaya athiwa sanrakshana katayuthu sidu karini..
indika...sowiyat deshaya kisima amathyanshayakin gahapu ekak nemeyi neda?
me samastha yojanawaliya parajaya kirimata katayuthu kirima mawubimata aadaraya karana sama rata wasiyakuge ma ada pramukha karyaya we.

ya kala anith thirawala, anthima thiraye da elesa ma kele ya. 12 pasuwa ohu eka thira watiyaka mudu panahak da eewa ekinekata muhuna la sitina lesa, anith thirawala anthima thira watiye mudu panahak da sawi kele ya. 13 mese kala pasu ohu ran koku panahak sada eka mandapayak wana paridi thira ekateka kokuwalin sambandha kele ya. 14 pasuwa ohu mandapaya udin kudaram aawaranayak men damimata elu lomin thira ekolahak sadi ya. 15 eka eka thiraye diga mitar dahathunak da palala mitar dekak da wiya.
